settings.relayMenuText0: Use the Nostr common relay setting (kind: 10002)

toast.relayError: The list of relays must include at least one read and one writeable relay.

beforeUnload.message: Changed settings are not saved. Are you sure you want to leave the page?

nostviewstr.kind30007: Edit Mute by kind (kind:30007) in NostViewstr

settings.globalRelay: (List with ID (d tag) of KIND:30002 as global is used as Global Relay.)

display.loadImage: Load and display all images (Real-time profile update ON/OFF)
display.menu: Display the menu on the left side
display.showRelayIcon: Display relay informations under the user icons
display.banner: Show the account banner on the right

imageAutoExpand.label: Auto-expand images
imageAutoExpand.following: Auto-expand images from following users only

post.addClientTag: Add client tag (via) to your posts

emoji.notes: Emojis with invalid characters are automatically corrected and registered. However, emojis containing no valid characters are excluded.

settings.relay: The changes will take effect after reloading.

usage.title: Settings that affect data consumption: ↑Highest to ↓Lowest

save.rewrite: A data entry with the same name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
save.new: Are you sure you want to create a new entry with the specified name?

load.title: Load/Save Settings
load.description: Stored in the relay with kind: 30078 ID: lumi-settings (NIP-78)
load.title2: Load Settings / Save Current Settings to Relay
load.description2: If a data entry with the same name exists, it will be overwritten.

post.confirm: There is unposted text. Are you sure you want to close?
post.quote: You can cite users and posts with nostr:npub..., nostr:nevent....
post.hell: You are about to reply to more than 30 people. Are you sure you want to proceed?
post.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this? This action cannot be undone.

petname.write: Able to set the display name (petname) of the follow users.
petname.warning: Since it's public, avoid names that could be problematic.

channel.settingswarning: To view the channel page, you must set up a pubkey first.

menu.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this channel from your list?
menu.addConfirm: Are you sure you want to add this channel to your list?

create.title: Create New Channel
create.name: Channel Name
create.addToList: Add this channel to my personal list
create.error: Failed to create channel. Please try again.

list.settingswarning: To view the list page, you must set up a pubkey first.

about.luminostr: Use it when your follow list, bookmarks, etc. have been lost
about.userChannel: Questions, requests, bug reports, usage helps, and more about Lumilumi!

create_kind3.newMessage: If a follow list already exists, it will be reset. Are tou sure to create a new one?
create_kind3.message: Couldn't find any follow lists. Please click the button below to create a new follow list.
create_kind3.reload: The page will be reload after the creation.

description.global: Use relay set with dtag of kind:30002 as global
description.search: Use kind:10007 (search relay) if some search words are provided
description.search2: If kind:10007 is not found, use default relay settings
description.search3: Please set up relays that has search function.

10030.title: Confirm creation of the custom emoji list
10030.text: Custom emoji list (kind:10030) is missing. Create a new one?

kind10000.text: Mute list (KIND:10000) not found. Create a new one?

global.explain: Set up your public key (and configure kind:30002 id:global) on the settings page, or access the global timeline by using the following URL to see the global timeline:

setting.pubkey: Please enter your public key on the settings page or log in via the Nostr banner on the right.

shortcut.title: Keyboard Shortcut
shortcut.CtrlEnter: Submit the post (from the Create Post Window)

message.0: Thank you for using Lumilumi. Please use the new domain https://lumilumi.app from now on.
message.1: If you want to transfer your settings, you can save and restore them by clicking the "Upload/Download current configuration to relay" button at the bottom of the settings page.
message.2: The "Sync" settings will not be transferred, so please click each button again to synchronize.

nostrlogin.description: This website is part of the Nostr network. Log in with your Nostr profile or sign up to join.

search.excludeproxynote: Exclude posts from other social media
search.syntaxPropertiesDescription: Search content if no properties specified. Use following formats for filtered search:

propertyDescription.author: Specify author's public key
propertyDescription.mention: Specify public key mentioned in post

syntaxExample.userPostsUntil: Search text posts from specific user until specified date
syntaxExample.noteReactions: Search reactions (replies, likes) to specific note
syntaxExample.taggedPosts: Search text posts with specific tag
syntaxExample.profileUntil: Search profile info until specified date

warning.title: Error
warning.description: Please enter text for all options

signError.eventSize: Invalid event data size (must be between 1 and 65535 bytes)

features.title: Features

bookmarkLink.before: For private bookmarks or bookmark organization, please use
